heroSection.title: People and projects matter in the development of institutions
heroSection.description: We aim to establish strong and sustainable partnerships that ensure the growth of institutions.

bannerSection.title: Our certified lawyers
bannerSection.description: A team certified by prestigious institutions

aboutSection.title: CONSULLAB
aboutSection.subtitle: About us
aboutSection.description1: Consullab is an Angolan law firm that operates in the field of legal, financial, and tax consulting, providing all assistance in a modality we call institutional consulting to highlight the integrated and multifaceted perspective of its operations.
aboutSection.description2: We meticulously analyze each situation to offer the best legal solutions, focusing on practical and efficient results.

values1.title: Transparency
values1.description: Our projects prioritize well-founded and justifiable solutions, leaving no doubts about their origin and efficiency

values2.title: Democracy
values2.description: Our projects are built jointly with partners/clients, in a perspective of permanent and free dialogue

values3.title: Progress
values3.description: We accompany our partners and measure their growth. The initially determined goals are regularly evaluated, with a strong concern for their effectiveness.

statsSection.title: The consultancy
statsSection.description: We understand that each client is unique, and that's why our approach is always personalized. We meticulously analyze each situation to offer the best legal solutions, focusing on practical and efficient results. Our commitment is to the success and satisfaction of our clients, ensuring that their legal issues are treated with due attention and professionalism.

stats1.title: Opinions
stats1.description: issued on a significant number of cases.

stats2.title: Training sessions
stats2.description: we have trained many professionals in various subjects

stats3.title: Diplomas
stats3.description: drafted, including laws, decrees, and regulations.

card.title: ABOUT US
card.description: History and competencies of our consultancy

servicesSection.title: Our services
servicesSection.subtitle: We operate in the most complex areas of law, offering services of various natures.

quoteSection.quote: At Consullab, we believe that transparency is the foundation of every relationship of trust. Our commitment is to be clear, honest, and direct with our clients, so they always know where they are and where we are going together.
quoteSection.description: We believe that the true value of legal consulting lies in the ability to anticipate problems and create strategies that protect and boost our clients' businesses.

teamSection.title: Our team
teamSection.subtitle: Embodying excellence, professionalism, reliability, and creativity, we have a team with a wide range of specializations.
teamSection.description1: At Consullab, we believe that our clients' success begins with the strength and excellence of our team. Composed of highly qualified lawyers, consultants, economists, and managers who are specialists in various areas. Our team is the foundation that supports every service we offer.
teamSection.description2: We value collaboration in our team, believing that the best solutions emerge when brilliant minds work together. Our integrated approach allows us to consider all facets of a legal problem, offering more complete and robust solutions.
